headline: Commercial HVAC Industry Report 2026: Market Size and Trends, Budget Allocation, Regulations, Key Acquisitions, Competitive Landscape and Forecasts 2025-2033
summary: The global commercial HVAC market is experiencing significant growth, driven by rapid urbanization, increased construction, and demand for energy-efficient, smart (IoT-enabled) systems to improve indoor air quality, with Asia-Pacific holding the largest market share.
